I was thinking about an odd little thing that happened in my job and I still can't help wondering about from time to time.
 
 I work in distribution and a few months ago received an order for a couple of pallets of soap. Nothing odd about that but the recipient's name got my attention:
 
 T. Durden
 
 Now, if you have ever seen the film Fight Club the connection will strike you straight away. If not, have a read this overview to see what I'm getting at.
 
 I arranged for the delivery to be sent and off it went....... but I still can't help but think that someone was playing a joke by putting the addresse as Durden or maybe project mayhem is really running. I still have a wry chuckle whenever I think of it.
 
 Has anyone else had this sort of experience or other weirdness?

post_info.post_title: Things that struck you as weird....

About a month and a half ago, I was enroute to my midday stop. On the way, I saw two Buick LeSabres which were different colors. I thought to myself, "OK." A few seconds later, I saw two matching Volkswagens in my rearview mirror. I knew that two of my supervisors have matching Oldsmobiles. Then I thought to myself, "this is just too wierd.":)

One thing that I recall as strange is from the original King Kong movie. The natives built a huge fence around their village (to keep Kong out) but put in a gate large enough for Kong to enter. Sounds like poor planning to me.
 Dono
I think it was about a month and a half ago now or so, but I remember when there was a Wendey's that got robbed by an x-employee named Ronald McDonald.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Things that struck you as weird....
